In many media, I see that there are magic casting classes that use swords as well as magic. You know those Magic Knight classes in many RPG?

But I've never seen any Magic users who also use guns.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54def5766368727229221100#post_54def5766368727229221100
Many, almost anything can be made awesome by sticking an extra gun on it. I mean, we have a gun-axe:
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/P%C3%B3%C5%82hak.jpg/320px-P%C3%B3%C5%82hak.jpg!
gun-brass knuckles:
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/47/Deleaxhe_Apache_pistol_7mm.jpg/640px-Deleaxhe_Apache_pistol_7mm.jpg!
gun-shields:
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4b/Gun-shield%2C_perhaps_Italy%2C_circa_1540_-_Higgins_Armory_Museum_-_DSC05680.JPG/640px-Gun-shield%2C_perhaps_Italy%2C_circa_1540_-_Higgins_Armory_Museum_-_DSC05680.JPG!
and honest-go-God real-life gunblades:
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/07/Elgin_cutlass_pistol.jpg/800px-Elgin_cutlass_pistol.jpg!
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/55/Cutlass_pistol_on_display_at_Salem_Pirate_Museum%2C_Massachusetts.jpg!
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Hunting_Knife_combined_with_Wheellock_Pistol_%28Munich%2C_1546%29_%28from_Metropolitan_Museum_of_Art%2C_New_York%29.jpg/640px-Hunting_Knife_combined_with_Wheellock_Pistol_%28Munich%2C_1546%29_%28from_Metropolitan_Museum_of_Art%2C_New_York%29.jpg!
Okay that last one is just a knife, but still, swords with guns on them!
